name: tiny-mushroom
short_effect: Fire Red and Leaf Green: Trade two for prior Level-up moves. Sell for 250 Pokédollars, or to Hungry Maid for 500 Pokédollars.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A very small and rare mushroom. It’s popular with a certain class of collectors and sought out by them.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A very small and rare mushroom. It’s popular with a certain class of collectors and sought out by them.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A very small and rare mushroom. It’s popular with a certain class of collectors.
